reviews.text: Cool and Lovely place to hang out !!!

When I was here in April, 2016, the place was pretty lively. Some people got water from the fountains, some people played with the water and some, like me simply watching all these. I thought every one liked to be here for different reasons!

Great place! It is public though, so it is extremely crowded and full of farmers taking the cold water from the tiger's heads. A great picture spot! There are also fountains all over the spring to drink the extremely pure water.

The pictures I took only let you see, this was special, it was a Sunday morning and I had been invited to come to the English speakers corner which is on about 9.30 till lunch on Sunday mornings.
Not only is this visually beautiful, it goes deeper, there is thousands who come to this area to collect their week's drinking water in large plastic containers which they then transport home on bikes, motorbikes, scooters, barrows and all sorts of conveyances.
It was amazing to see so many people using and making this a wonderful place to be.  I would urge people to visit here on a week day and definitely on a Sunday morning.
I feel priveleged to have experienced this beautiful place full of warm generous people.
Clean springs water and I was glad to see the residents collected spring water than dirty the water. :)
Excellent museum with special attention to Shandong!
Nice place
每到一个地方必须要去博物馆
꼭 가볼만한곳임
处于略微郊区的地点，好停车，馆藏丰富，推荐石雕佛像，汉墓砖(石)画，书画展。本地市民可凭身份证免费入馆参观，关门时间略早。

A huge plaza where you can find locals relaxing, exercising, and strolling. Great place to be immersed in the culture.You'll find a major landmark of Jinan here. On the square itself, there are a few small shops that sell soft drinks and snacks. Under the square, there is a pretty big grocery store with some eateries.
A great place to visit !!!
Nice place to hangout. I like the gathering of people there and I like the way they interact with eachother.

A very nice place to start off to any other sight in Jinan, the city river floats right next to it and there is even a small underground shopping-area. The fountain, which turns on every couple of hours, accompanied by Chinese traditional music, is surrounded by semi-circled pavilion featuring some of Shandong's and China's greatest personalities.
A lovely place in Jinan to take photos and spend time with friends & family! Hope the underground market is still there 😊

Temple has a Buddhist ritual at 4pm every day. I would also advise to climb the stairs all the way up to the old Buddha statue on the mountain (over thousand years old). It offers nice views over the area around if the weather is good.
Beautiful statues and art and gardens.
not good
要是顺路就进来看看，和国内很多寺庙一样，到处的捐赠排名碑，很有“特色”！给人印象深刻的是大殿前的杏树！
造訪靈巖寺聆賞古剎歷史典故。

Expensive and limited parking space.
Best pizza I have ever had! The whole vibe of the place is warm and just lovely, and the service is amazing. I still remember it to this day 😊
味道不怎么好
